These are all standard and reputable payment options used by many businesses, which does not align with the characteristic of fraudulent sites using unusual payment methods. The website also has a privacy policy, terms and conditions, and a return & refund policy, suggesting transparency in its operations. Based on the observations from the WHOIS data, the presence of reviews on third-party websites, the type of products offered, the payment methods accepted, and the information provided on the website, there are no immediate signs that https://securitall.com/ is a fraudulent site according to the characteristics outlined.
